V

Vacation - Class in edu.subram43purdue.travelplanner
This class represents a vacation, which has 5 different fields/attributes: a name, location, start date, end date, and an array list of events.
Vacation(String, String, String, String, ArrayList<Event>) - Constructor for class edu.subram43purdue.travelplanner.Vacation
This is the constructor for the vacation class and it requires 5 parameters, which are all the same as the five fields of this class
vacation - Static variable in class edu.subram43purdue.travelplanner.VacationsMainActivity
This field represents the vacation that belongs to this activity
VACATION_KEY - Static variable in class edu.subram43purdue.travelplanner.MainActivity
This is the vacation key, which is used when a specific vacation is clicked on, to track that specific vacation with this identification key
VacationActivity - Class in edu.subram43purdue.travelplanner
This activity is used for users to create a new vacation and add it to their current list of vacations.
VacationActivity() - Constructor for class edu.subram43purdue.travelplanner.VacationActivity
 
VacationListAdapter - Class in edu.subram43purdue.travelplanner
This class is used to adapt our Array List of vacations to our list view in the Main Activity class to provide an accurate and updated version of our vacation list every time.
VacationListAdapter(Context, List<Vacation>) - Constructor for class edu.subram43purdue.travelplanner.VacationListAdapter
This is the constructor for our VacationListAdapter class.
vacations - Static variable in class edu.subram43purdue.travelplanner.MainActivity
This is the main ArrayList of vacations, which holds all the vacations, we read the list of vacations from external storage, using the readVacationList() static method from the FileSaver class
VacationsMainActivity - Class in edu.subram43purdue.travelplanner
This Activity is the activity that contains a majority of the app's features, as this is the home page for a specific vacation.
VacationsMainActivity() - Constructor for class edu.subram43purdue.travelplanner.VacationsMainActivity
